website_summaries.verdict: Fashioned from plenty of natural ingredients – such as sunflower oil and extra virgin olive oil – this vegan-friendly and cruelty-free charcoal bar has raving fans everywhere.
pros: Great for shaving as well as cleaning face and body
Soap can be sent back for any reason if not satisfied with the results
Users really love the citrus and mint smell and the lack of harsh chemicals
Clears up even the toughest acne
cons: Some users would like to see it lather up more
May be a bit too drying for those with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Leads to breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted to try something with dead sea mud. I did read the reviews and the description indicated the mud (or combination of ingredients) may lead to breakouts initially. Well, that is true. I'm well past the age of breakouts, and this soap definitely led to some redness and breakouts. I tried not using it every day, but seems like whenever I used it, the following day my skin was irritated. Not an allergic reaction (skin was not hot or inflamed), more like the detox effect was encouraging breakouts. In any case, I won't be using this on my face anymore. I will say it does have a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: EmilieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ACNE FREE AFTER 5 DAYS
customer_reviews.text: Has the worst breakout of my life and my neighbor suggested this kind of soap. The pictures are only 5 days apart. My face feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Morton

customer_reviews.title: Frigging magic
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Pushes all the gunk to the surface of your pores, then you can exfoliate it the rest of the way out or it will come out on its own after a few washes. I have tried several other charcoal products - none did this. I'm seriously so impressed and going to use this stuff indefinitely. The first week or so you will break out some as all that gunk rises to the surface. So worth it though. Never felt cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soap!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this soap. I have Psoriasis on the side of my face near my hairline. Everyday I need to use a prescription crime for it. I used this soap yesterday for the first time and the psoriasis did not need any medication. Nothing had ever worked but the prescription! Ecstatic user!
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Szabo

customer_reviews.title: A keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a natural soap and this is it! Some of the other soaps I’ve used just didn’t smell good to me....always a little to earthy for me. I really missed the clean smell of my toxic soap that I previously used so I was thrilled to find this has such a nice fresh citrus scent and activated charcoal to top it off. I have been gradually switching all my personal products to organic or as natural as I can get. This is a keeper for sure.
customer_reviews.author: teresa lee

customer_reviews.title: For acne and clean skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this soap for 4 months now. I bought it because I suffer from severe acne on my face and arms. In the first two weeks I had a major breakout of terrible acne. But the description of the soap said it is completely normal, as it slowly expels all the bacteria. After two weeks, my acne started improving so much. Now I get the occasional ones when I can't wash my face more than twice during the day. I love the soap and to make it last longer I cut it in half and each half lasts me for about one month.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Elisabetta

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver!!!! My face begin to clear within days of using this product (in addition to my honey and facial moisturizer). P.S. I have oily skin
customer_reviews.author: Maria Golder

customer_reviews.title: Bad start but great finish 😊
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using the product my face broke out. It does say on the packaging that you may break out at first. But, I’ve never used this product so I didn’t know what to expect. I got little white heads on my forehead and on the sides of my chin. After about 1 1/2 weeks the pimples started to go away and I started seeing normal results. My face is about 95% clear and the soap works great. Sometimes I’ll see a little white head if I don’t use it twice a day. So, I’m still a little iffy about purchasing again. I’ll give it some more time, I still have a lot of soap left.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bumps like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap for almost a week and my skin looks disgusting. I know the seller says this is a detox soap and your skin may go through a purging period, but this is ridiculous. I have bumps all over my cheeks, even the painful under the skin ones. I can't imagine my skin eventually clearing up with continued use of this. On the positive side, it does smell really good and leaves your face very clean afterwards. I will continue to use this for another week to see if my skin clears up but right now I am not happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Made face all itchy.....
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years,it was great,you changed packaging and must of changed something else.Face all itchy today,never happened before,I deserve money back,I bought this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: terrence a mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this soap for my face (bad pimples, cystic acne, pigment scarring) in the hopes it would help clear everything up. Had high hopes after reading other reviews. Honestly, the soap didn’t really help at all. I used three times a day for almost three months and didn’t notice a difference. It smells nice, feels nice. I’ll use it up but I won’t order again.
customer_reviews.author: ASM

customer_reviews.title: Glad I decided to try it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because at 32 my skin had started looking like that of a teenager. I heard many good things about charcoal soaps being good for acne. I’ve been using it twice a day for a while now and am happy with the results. My skin is clearing up and feels so fresh after washing with this. The smell is light and not offensive. It can be a little drying, so I have to make sure to moisturize well after each wash (which I’d do after any cleanser). Between this soap and the LilyAna Naturals face cream and retinol cream, my face is looking much better!
customer_reviews.author: L2Mom

customer_reviews.title: pretty much cleared up my acne in a week and ...
customer_reviews.text: So I have the most sensitive skin on earth. You look at my skin wrong, it breaks out. You talk about my skin, it breaks out. Always have had issues with acne and redness. Tried everything and it never worked. I only use natural products as I try not to put anything harsh on my skin. Saw this and thought I'd give it a shot. This stuff cleared up my redness after one day, pretty much cleared up my acne in a week and a half. Can't wait to see the results months from now. Not a fan of the smell, it's kinda strong, but it works so I could care less how it smells!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne and redness
customer_reviews.text: I am 35 weeks pregnant and experiencing horrible acne on my back and chest. I've never had this before so I didn't know what to do about it. I saw the reviews and decided this was worth a try. Even upon my first use it cleared up a lot of the inflammation. It is continuing to clear up these areas. It is not hydrating... so I recommend a moisturizer afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bar on December 16th, 2017 and immediately started using it for my face and body. Upon arrival I cut the bar in half to extend the use. I was the only one using it daily and one half of the bar lasted me until January 21, 2018 until it was too small to properly lather. I then just added it to the 2nd half of the bar. It has helped my sensitive and acne prone skin. I plan on making this my soap of choice.
customer_reviews.author: HashiGoMo

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be the first to tell you that this stuff really makes my skin feel great. I use it then apply almond or coconut oil afterwards and I have a nice purifying sheen. The scent smells lovely and I will add this soap to my top list of must-buy products. It is essential if you are about healthy skin with a pleasing scent. I am going to order more and try other scents to see how they work. But this one I tried is the real deal folks. Use it well.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: So much to love about this product
customer_reviews.text: So much to love about this product. Only sad thing is that bar goes too quick! It smells so good. I use with a loofa to get a nice sud going. i can definitely say it has cleared up my shoulders and chest, definitely better than it looked before. I just reordered my second bar, I have a feeling it will be a permanent staple in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Left me with more acne than to begin with
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried so hard to give this bar a chance due to the high, consistent reviews and low cost, but over the course of a month I have developed acne similar to when I was a freshman in high school. It has created deep rooted acne on my forehead due to clogged pores. I do not wear any makeup and keep a very neutral skin care routine as a vegan so it is easy to rule this product as the cause to my acne and now present insecurity. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product after reading reviews about how it cleared up acne. For me this soap is not a cure-all for cystic acne or magic bullet, but it does leave your face feeling clean and calms everything down a bit. Combined with diet changes like eliminating diary completely and wheat most of the time, making sure my blood sugar levels are stable, eating vegetables at every meal and fruit in between meals, juicing every morning, and taking magnesium and zinc supplements, the soap works well to give my face a clear complexion. I also really like that this soap does not make my skin more sensitive to the sun! That's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of blackheads and this soap really helped make a noticeable difference. After I finished the first bar, I tried another brand because it was less expensive and regretted it as it didn't work and all my progress was halted or reversed. I ordered another bar of this and the difference was almost immediate for me. It may be a little expensive, but it is a high quality charcoal soap, not just a black colored bar.
customer_reviews.author: J Veler

customer_reviews.title: I am taking this one for my trip.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about cosmetics, I don't care about skin, and lotions stuff. BUT this thing rocks! I got much better face complexion so I don't look like field soldier anymore. My face got little bit brighter. The greasiness of my body is gone too! But it is soft and not dry at all. I am taking only this one for my skin care on my deployment.
customer_reviews.author: Kousou Otsuki

customer_reviews.title: just "meh".
customer_reviews.text: If this was based just on customer service, they'd get five stars, no doubt. But based on the product itself, it was just "meh" for me. Maybe I had too high of expectations based on the wonderful reviews I read on here. But it did nothing for my face whatsoever (I have combination skin, and my adult break outs are mostly hormonal). I used it twice a day for about a month. Won't be buying a second time, but again, the customer service was great!
customer_reviews.author: Lanissa Belk

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bar soap for my husband so he’ll stop using my fancy face wash. However I started using it as well at first due to convenience but then I really like it! I have adult acne and while it did not completely clear up my face it feels a lot more tolerable. Also it is not too strongly scented. It feels pretty mild and doesn’t dry up my skin. My hubby definitely likes it more than my “fancy” face wash because it lathers up. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: My problem did not get better and some days it was worse
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and very sensitive skin that itches all the time. The dermatologist suggested using a perfume free soap and lotion after bathing which I did for several months. My problem did not get better and some days it was worse. I decided to try this soap and was amazed at how good my skin felt and the itching is almost completely gone. My skin feels so good now and I rest better at night without the never ending itch.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Drudy

customer_reviews.title: A M A Z I N G!
customer_reviews.text: This soap has saved my face. I spent years trying different treatments, both synthetic/clinical products and naturals. This blend, however, is the champion! My rosacea has diminished/is less irritating, I rarely get pimples anymore, and my face feels/looks clean. I would (as does the company) suggest using a moisturizer after washing your face with this product. What I like most, I discovered this product is made in Clearwater, FL, which is less than 5 miles from my home! I will likely try to buy this locally from now on. It doesn't leave a weird, soap-scale feeling on my face, either, which is a huge plus! Post-wash moisturizer I'd suggest for the face: Svasthya Essential Oils Face Butter
customer_reviews.author: Dharma Kava Lounge

customer_reviews.title: Beat fascial soap.
customer_reviews.text: I've waited until my first soap is finish. I use it to clean my face only and out of all the soap I've used over the years this soap is hands down the best facial soap. My face is naturally oily and when I used other store brand soap I would notice ashes after washing and have to use dry skin cream, but with this soao? Absolutely nothing. I don't even need to use dry skin cream after washing my face. Tips to other: Wet your face first, then use this soap and leave it for a minute ( I leave it on while I brush my teeth) then rinse it off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alam

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my Skin Itching
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time, and as soon as I got out the shower my skin started crawling because it felt so dry. I've used bar soaps in the past and haven't felt that feeling before. I also feel like this product is rather pricey given it doesn't leave me feeling moisturized in any way. I'm rather disappointed with this product so far. As far as the smell, the mint comes out but for some reason I get a smell of play dough from it as well. Overall, I'm not satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: C. Benning

customer_reviews.title: Working!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly suspicious..I've used it for three days and damn it worked fast..my pores looks smaller, my oily face isn't nearly as oily, my skin doesnt hurt or feel ultra dry and my acne dissapeared..Nothing has every worked before. I hated looking in my mirror and seeing MASSIVE gross black pores. I'll update my review in two weeks. Edit: First week and there is a noticable difference in my skin. My face isn't nearly as oily and my complexion has evened out a lot. I had a couple minor pimples pop up but they left the next day. Product did say this was normal! I'm optimistic! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Soap Ever
customer_reviews.text: This soap makes my face feel cleaner than any other I have ever used. It is literally squeaky clean. Amazed and never thought I would feel so happy about a soap. I wanted a soap just for my face, have never liked moisturizers or other stuff, just wanted clean feeling and to feel like everything washed off. This delivers so much that I will be buying for body use. Never thought I would say, "I love this soap", but I am saying it. Happy customer who realized I have never used an awesome soap. Ingredients make me feel good about it and company seems very genuine. Definite customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: CAD Junky

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This bar soap smells really good, in fact it made our bathroom smell great. This however does not match my skin, it dried my skin immensely and made me grow huge pimples, I did not mind it at first cause it was supposed to detox the skin for the first 2 weeks but my skin never recovered, the huge pimples just kept on coming and they were the kind that are so swollen, it hurts. Needless to say this soap did not work well for me, I guess my skin was too sensitive. My skin is still recuperating from the scars left by the pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Kabigting

customer_reviews.title: Amazing soap
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing! & its helping to clear up patches I have from psoriasis. Old and new. It also last a long time. But from time to time it would give me like a little red bump in different spots. Like tiny hair bumps not sure why. If it didn't do that it would be 5 stars. Anyway, I love it for psoriasis. I hope they make shampoos like it some day. Im buying again :D
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on the reviews. I previously used Dove Men + deep cleanse but who the heck know what’s it the main brands. Bought this since I figured the ingredients were all natural. They probably are, but I’m not a scientist. As a consumer, the bar dried me out (maybe good for greasy skin), I didn’t love the feel of it, and it didn’t feel like I was getting a deep soapy cleanse. I went with Dr Bronners peppermint after this one. I love that soap
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Fiegleman

customer_reviews.title: A great facial soap!
customer_reviews.text: I have generally good skin except some redness on my chin. I have used Rodan and Fields redefine line for two years and it works well but is way super expensive and contains a lot of chemicals. I've been making it a priority to move towards a healthier and more sustainable lifestyle so the R+F had to go! This is my first skincare purchase since trying to find natural and inexpensive alternatives, and so far I'm very pleased! Two things I notice from short term use 1) it doesn't make my skin feel tight/dry after using like other soaps, 2) it is excellent asst removing eye makeup without having to scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M Eckelberry

customer_reviews.title: Soap smells delightful and lathers like normal soap
customer_reviews.text: Soap smells delightful and lathers like normal soap. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because I have little acne spots on my shoulders and back that come and go and was excited when I read reviews on this soap that said that all went away when they used this soap. That was not the results I got but I still enjoy the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey W

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this soap for a few days now, but so far, it's amazing!! Like many other people, in the reviews that I read before purchasing this soap, I also have a horrible problem with acne. I'm a 37 year old female that has had issues with acne since I was 13. I'm allergic to salicylic acid, I've taken meds, I've tried countless all natural & organic products, but to no avail. Within these first few days of using this soap though, things are already better than they've been with any other product! The acne has lessened, the redness has started getting better, & my skin just looks fresher! I will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki F

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say thank you enough for saving my daughter's skin. I never write reviews but felt if I could help someone else by sharing our success, I would want to help as many people as possible. She was dealing with troublesome acne on her forehead that began to appear on the side of her nose. (the T-zone). Well, I decided to try this religiously day and night on her face followed by dr. weil's moisturizer (origins). She has had 90% improvement! I am beyond grateful for this incredible product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Black Soap
customer_reviews.text: I love Erno Lazlo soap, but not the price. This soap is beautifully black with a mostly Lemon Verbena herbal scent. I purchased it for a face cleanser, but have not tried it, yet. If it isn’t gentle enough for my sensitive skin, it will go in the powder room for guests to enjoy. The company’s customer service contacted me to recommend cutting the soap in half to extend its life: a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap! Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. The smell is wonderful. It leaves my skin feeling so fresh and clean along with feeling moisturized. I am very prone to acne but this has not caused me to break out. It has helped my skin tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Denter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing facial soap!
customer_reviews.text: This soap has been a godsend for my face! I'm in my late 20s and haven't suffered from acne in almost 15 years, so when I started breaking out regularly, I was annoyed. I tried using name brand acne face washes and they made the problem even worse, causing me to have rashes and more irritation. I've only been using this bar of soap for a couple days, but I can already see a positive difference in tone evenness of my face and my acne is almost nonexistent. Also, I'm pretty sure this soap will last for months, but if you're looking to make it last even longer, cut it into 1/4 pieces to use one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Smells odd and burns
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband, he couldn’t stand the smell, it is pungent. Other family members tried and complained it burned/irritated their skin. Didn’t leave any marks or burns thankfully. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Would have given 5 stars, but...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this stuff. Smells AMAZING and my skin looks great. It lasted a while for me (until I started letting my husband use it too. Haha!). I think it would last us a month if we shared it, so not bad. My only gripe about this is that they packaged it in thick plastic. I'm trying to cut plastic where I can, so until they start packaging with something besides plastic, I'll buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Yaaaaas!  Good for “Maskne”
customer_reviews.text: I have what is called “makne”. Which you get when you are an essential health care worker. I got this because I was told to get charcoal soap for it. I saw that it was Dead Sea and that made me go for it. The box said to give it two weeks but I’ve seen results in 3 days. I’m also using tea tree oil. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R. Neys

customer_reviews.title: Can dry out your face
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's an ok face soap. I think the best part is the smell of the bar and that its 4oz. I was using Beauty Counter charcoal soap and looking for a cheaper alternative. It is about half the price, but will be going back to beautycounter as its better quality. The soap is not good for me as my forehead is dryer than my nose. After every use my forehead is dried out and the skin is flaky. Worth a shot might work better for others.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Beecher

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much , I will be always used forever these product it helps my acne and pimple gone . I'll been using different type of product for my face everything not work so good . so when I read there review of these dead sea mineral mud I order without hesitation put my trues of these product and I know with in 1week it light up my skin and get ride my acne and pimple. I'm super and happy satisfy of these. definitely my forever acne and pimple treatment
customer_reviews.author: ma theresa

customer_reviews.title: Notice a difference immediately and love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap after reading reviews and how much it has helped other people's acne. I break out badly on my back during the summer (I'm 30... you'd think I would be past it by now!). I have only used this a few times but can immediately tell the difference! I love the smell (it is strong of lemongrass and it makes my entire bathroom smell good) and my skin feels great. I have VERY sensitive skin and had razor burn on my legs from trying to shave quickly before wearing shorts the day prior and I used the soap and it eased the rash as well. I am hooked and definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for my skin
customer_reviews.text: Love!! This is now all I use to clean my face twice a day. I always had spots, and the difference in my face has been amazing! I now very rarely get any spots. This bar last forever as well! I have now purchased my second bar and the first bar lasted me 5 months after using twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl O Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Works like MAGIC!
customer_reviews.text: This product does WONDERS. I got this product a week ago and my acne is already starting to clear up. This effectively exfoliates your skin but it also leaves it dry (which is what it’s supposed to do in order to fully exfoliate) so I just put on moisturizer and my face is smooth and glowing. I do this in the morning, evening, and right before I go to sleep. Patience is key, for me results started appearing in a week but it could be different for others. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashraf Elsafty

customer_reviews.title: It lasted almost two days and was so bad a took a day off work
customer_reviews.text: The day after using this soap, I had a crazy rash all over my face. It lasted almost two days and was so bad a took a day off work. I wish I had taken a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rash!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is extremely potent. I'm not sure what was in it, but I broke out with a huge red and burning rash. It might have been something in there, so use at your own risk! Just for reference, I do NOT have sensitive skin, nor have I ever had to use specific soaps to prevent sensitive skin. It maybe have been something in there I was allergic to, but I don't believe it is the cure-all that it is claiming to be. I would suggest testing it on your hand before using the bar, just to see how you feel. I bought two soap bars, and had to throw both of them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away unless you are fumigating your home
customer_reviews.text: Super potent scent made my roommate throw up from the overwhelming smell. Have used others that had no smell and that’s what I expected. This went to the trash. As far as the soap over dried my skin and made me itch. No other soap has ever done that
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate product description
customer_reviews.text: Warning Has castor oil in it so if you have oily skin this will not help and also it states on product description at very bottom that commercial soaps have the naturally occurring glycerin removed WELL ON THE SOAP BOX GLYCERIN IS NOT LISTED SO I GUESS it’s removed cause it’s probably commercial made and not homemade . Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Moonbeams

customer_reviews.title: As close to an acne cure as I've come to
customer_reviews.text: I adore this soap and the Lavender Goat's Milk soap. Between the two products, I've basically "cured" (is it ever really cured?) my bodily acne - neck, arms, chest, back - since starting to use this product last May. It has worked better than any acne-specific wash that I have used. When I decided to try something *different* with the start of the new year, a body cleanser, my body reacted violently and returned to the way it was back before I started using these soap bars, all in a matter of days. It's a bit of a recovery process getting back to where I had been, but the difference is clear. Never making the same mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Really like the soap but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes the soap, but the bar is almost gone after a week of usage for one individual. We did not buy the holders with the soap so I can only assume it's due to water in the shower. We did get the holders so I am willing to try another bar to see if it will last longer. If not I can't justify spending $10 a week for bath soap. Deducted one star for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really helped my husband that normally starts sweating right out of the shower. He washes with this and he doesn't sweat right out of the shower and while he's at work he doesn't sweat much and feels great because he doesn't smell. He has really sensitive skin and this product does not brake him out
customer_reviews.author: Samara bedell

customer_reviews.title: Bad Alternative to African Black Soap
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and packaging was good but I don't really like the actual product itself. It strips the face of a lot of oils leaving it SQUEAKY clean which can be okay or not depending on what you want out of this soap. The cleaning doesn't go very deep though; it's still superficial. It reminds me of a bad version of African black soap. The smell can be sharp and burn a bit around the nose but it's not entirely unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: ReemM

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Second time puchase. I love how this product is gentle yet effective. My regiment has become this soap to cleanse, thayers alcholol free unscented witch hazel to tone followed by amara organics aloe vera gel. My pores are smaller my skin in smoother and breakouts are under control! Love it
customer_reviews.author: L.C.T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this soap a few times before writing a review. It definitely does a good job at cleaning out pores and moisturizing at the same time. But I still have to use a toner (witch hazel is my preferred one) and Rosewater for optimal effect. I never had oily skin until I moved to Houston, I’ve tried many natural products (Pacifica, Alba etc) that only work for a few weeks. My fiancé used it on his eczema and it helped as well. Neither of us had a bad reaction. The first time I used it I could feel a little tingle but not after that again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was desperately searching for a soap that would help alleviate my eczema flare up. My ski felt so raw and felt like a severe sun burn. This soap was helped dry up my flare up on my hand, legs, elbows, belly and arms. I haven't experienced any break outs or irritation from the soap. It's not a huge bar and my soap is quickly vanishing but it's worth it if you're only using it during flare ups verses every day use. I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Very very effective
customer_reviews.text: I had my skepticism about this. With one use, ALL my blackheads dissolved and my pore visibly tighter. Not overly drying. Scent is nice. Also, it did not make a black mess. The lather is thin and white. Very happy. But, I would only use once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Clean Feel, Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: In trying to reduce my dop kit size, I use bar soap rather than body wash when traveling. I liked the ingredients in this bar. I also like the non-perfumey scent and the fact that it readily washes off with no obvious residue. I am now on my second bar after several week long or longer trips, and I've found this bar lasts much longer than the brand I previously used. Thank goodness given the price!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Evens out Skin tone!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product twice a day for almost a week now. I must say that this soap has cleared out my acne (most of it). But the big difference to me is the fact that my face looks more even now as far as skin tone. I used to have a bit of scarring and dark spots around my acne, but using this soap has alleviated the area and cleared it. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Freshc

customer_reviews.title: Little bar, big results
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this bar of soap. I've only been using it for a few days and I swear my skin already feels softer and it lathers really well. Not much of a scent if that's what your after, but it definitely delivers. Highly recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I did give it the two week grace period for the “detoxing” of the skin that might cause breakouts. I didn’t notice any extra breakouts, my skin was mad before with random dry patches so I wanted to try something new. It smells soooo yummy and does feel so good while and after I use it. Happy I gave it a chance! Skin has calmed down a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Is a little smaller then expected. Defiantly goes by quickly. So try to savor the suds. My boyfriend breaks out on his back. And we use this for him and it really clears out the break outs. Not harsh, and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Britnay W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne, Not the strongest scent.
customer_reviews.text: This soap has been a great replacement for my usual soap. I’ve had a problem with generic soaps causing acne breakouts on my face and shoulders, but this soap is completely different. Works well for removing oils without leaving your face feeling unnaturally tight, and my acne has been reduced by at least 50%. The only thing that I disliked is that the soap is not very aromatic. You won’t smell like really anything but will feel VERY clean. The fact that when you buy, you are also supporting a small business is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! I had some acne breakout on my neck and jawline. Two days after I began using this soap, it began clearing up. My skin has a better texture too. I have a lot of issues with skin sensitivity and have to stay away from parabens, fragrances and other chemicals. This soap is all natural, and I hope they never stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: ANGMEM

customer_reviews.title: Just Great Soap!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has an acne challenge. Anytime she eats sugar, out they come, due to poor digestion. Her system is toxic due to poor elimination. The soap was suggested by a local vendor and it has helped a great deal. A person still needs to resolve the cause first and foremost, but the activated charcoal does help control the pathogens that are consistent with acne.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great soap. Try it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It's equivocal to Lush soap or Dead Sea Cosmetics; soap brand I've been buying for years and for many more dollars. It's soft consistency and silky texture feel great, not to mention the cooling feeling from the mint extract. It is a very good soap and I will definitely be buying more from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My skin is glowing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried at first; I knew from other reviews and the product labeling that I would break out more initially before seeing good results. I broke out BAD for the first two weeks, to the point that I almost stopped using it. Now my skin has finally cleared up, and it looks SO GOOD. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Soap
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this soap for a while and I love it. I have sensitive skin and it has never caused an issue. My skin has been completely clear while having this soap incorporated into my skin care routine for the past year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: this mud is the bomb
customer_reviews.text: this works and makes my skin glow, where has this been all my life? i have had such success with this product that i have given a bar to my girlfriend and my teenage son who i noticed was having some challenges with his skin. i'm in my 40s and have always used abrasive or medicated cleansers but this bar is far superior, makes my skin feel smooth, decreases redness, decreases sweat bumps on forehead, reduces breakouts, etc. couldn't be happier and have already reordered more. thanks for bringing the dead sea mud to california.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, no issues
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been using it long enough to give an in depth review on how it’s been working. But it arrived in a timely manner and I had no issues with its delivery. I’ll provide any updates on how it’s working if it works above or below my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: SMB music fan

customer_reviews.title: On the upside...
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent for what it is. It will work on your face by bringing up acne at least in the first couple of weeks until it totally clears your skin (so noted by manufacturer). If you want a fresh approach to your skincare for sensitive skin try this instead of other over the counter specialty soaps.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive dry skin. This soap bar works very well in rinsing away makeup and impurities. I always moisturize afterward. The smell is incredible! I have been to some of the finest spas in the country and the smell of this bar makes the end of a long day absolutely wonderful! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: straight up charcoal soap is much better: https
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, but stinks. It think primarily because of the camphor. If you want something that works well, straight up charcoal soap is much better:  -- it has only 3 ingredients, is a little more expensive but leaves me feeling incredibly clean without the stench of this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice scent. Just a very scant dring. HOWEVER, I believe if the user applies to much, this will be the affect. Being an acne suffer & perimenopausal, this was VERY soft to the facial skin. Cut the bar into 9 small pieces (but 6 will handle appropiately) placed the remaining back into box, store in cool, dry place.
customer_reviews.author: awesome bob

customer_reviews.title: Helped maintain healthy skin
customer_reviews.text: This soap has helped to maintain clear skin around my nose and mouth. About six years ago, I had perioral dematitis all around my chin, mouth and under my nose. Activated charcoal soap immediately cleared it up and since then I have continued to use activated charcoal soaps. This soap is smooth, smells nice and lathers well. I also appreciate that it's natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy usually this soap in the shower. Fragrance is great too! My only issue was that my bar came in two(2) pieces. Not a real problem but wanted a larger bar. I am sure this is one of those happened in shipping. Plan on reordering when nessessary!
customer_reviews.author: The Nuke

customer_reviews.title: My skin is clearer and smoother!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa whoa whoa!!!! This soap is amazing! This is my third time of using it morning and night, but it has already made a significant difference in my skin! My skin feels smoother and I can see that my pores have shrunken. I didn't know that my skin could look and feel this way. I suffered from acne for 17 years but this soap has helped me tremendously reducing existing pimples and preventing new ones from coming in! If you have combo to really oily, acne-prone skin, then I highly highly recommend that you try this!
customer_reviews.author: Dania

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as every other reviewer says
customer_reviews.text: Having read the numerous other reviews for this soap I decided to give it a try. I must say I was not disappointed. It was great for my skin, my beard, my hair, etc. The only downside is that if you leave it wet or under water it will shrink before your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: the best soap I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I Received this soap today .the best soap I have ever used. I feel totally refreshed .thank you for making such a terrific product . it has a wonderful aroma and the eucalyptus makes me feel fresh and tingly.. my skin also feels soft from the shea butter etc. i gave this product five stars.. I will continue purchasing this product for myself and loved ones . I would be very proud to give this product as a gift . God bless you and Keep up the good work. sincerely, A satisfied customer .*****
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had problems with acne and have always been trying to find something more natural and efficient to use on my face. This bar is the best thing I've found yet. It's easy to use and really gets into your skin to kill all the bad bacteria, it did bring out a bit of pimples at first but it cleared them out quickly and left my skin feeling great. The bar is easy to store and take traveling which was a plus for me. I've only had it for a week or two but my skin feels and looks much better than before. I'm extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dlm

customer_reviews.title: soft skin and just amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have used expensive cleansers for my face and this has been the most amazing product I have ever used and treat like gold. I haven't even used it on the rest of my body yet just my face then dry it and put it back in the box. I have flaky uneven dry skin and used this soap on my face with an exfoliating face sponge and I have never felt my skin so soft and flaking is gone!
customer_reviews.author: constance

customer_reviews.title: Not harsh at all on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap to use on my face. I have sensitive skin and a touch of Rosacea so I must be careful of the things that I put on my face. this seems to be the best so far. It makes a nice soft lather and to me has a lemony smell. Scent is not too strong to me and i am sensitive to fragrances. It does NOT have an artificial chemical smell like so many other soaps. My skin seems to like it. I order this soap again.
customer_reviews.author: yorkielovr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing! It works so well and never dries my skin! This is my 3rd time purchasing it because I can’t go without it now. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.R

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my skin
customer_reviews.text: I know once u start using this soap your skin is supposed to break out for about two weeks, but it’s been 1.5 months and my skin is all covered in acne! Never had one acne before in my life! Like totally damaged, very very bad! Even thou I stopped using it about two weeks ago but it still gets worse and worse! No matter what medicine I use it is not getting any better
customer_reviews.author: Amigo

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I love the soap. I have only used it a handful of times so far. It is exactly what I wanted. I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Moss

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Light scent with a gentle exfoliate. Made my face and body soft and my skin glow
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Felish

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this bar
customer_reviews.text: It’s a miracle on my face! My face has never been this clear so happy - and the bar is in tact lasting long! I always stand it up after use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time, I have had issues with acne on my face. I have been searching for a while for a soap that would be compatible with my skin and clear my persistent acne without resorting to things with chemicals that I couldn't pronounce. The Dead Sea Mud Soap Bar Natural & Organic Ingredients with Activated Charcoal did the magic. It has been about 2 weeks but I am most definitely excited about the results. Clearer and no more oily skin and my acne has definitely reduced. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Dee O

customer_reviews.title: Only soap that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've had trouble with skin irritations all my life and this is the only soap that relieves the problems completely. The best part about it is the fragrance -- not too medicinal, not too minty and very gender neutral. It leaves the skin feeling very clean and does not leave any residue. Next time, I may try some of the other formulations. I'll let you know how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: New York Older Lady

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from adult acne and after reading positive reviews from other acne prone adults, I figured I'd give this a try. Bottom line: Not that impressed. It's a nice soap, but I need something that will clear up my skin. This is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Blumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenager. She loves it and it has really helped with her (mild) acne. I use it occasionally and love how it makes my skin feel. We'll probably order another one when this one is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any skin type
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and sometimes I break out all over, other soaps got rid of the acne but was really tough on my skin. Looking into something more natural this was my choice, it smells great, I'm not allergic and it didn't dry or burn my skin. Instead it was left smooth and ask those impurities cleaned out, I'll update my review after a few more days of use to see how well it gets rid of my issue and how well it keeps it away. Also for those who sorry about their drains it won't leave any residue and the bar last a long time just don't leave it in water.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Moisturize after because It dried out my skin almost instantly.  It smells good though.
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on this . I used it for about 3 days then noticed little scabs on my face. The soap was the only thing that I did differently. I am still using it with hopes that maybe it was just my skin getting used to a different product. Be sure to moisturize after using because for me, it dried out my skin. It has a nice aroma. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: KSpratt

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have been trying everything out there to try to clear up my skin. Harsh acne facewashes would just dry out my skin so I wanted to go more natural. I have been using this for a week and so far the purification breakout has not been too bad and I have seen a major change in my skin. I love the scent, and the fresh clean feeling it leaves after washing my face. If it continues to give me these results I will definitely make this my go to face wash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aspen Kay Soap! Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these soaps! I only order these soaps! They are fantastic and the customer support is also very wonderful. Very nice folks at Aspen Kay! Orders yours today. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Petty

customer_reviews.title: Love the way this soap smells
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this soap smells. I haven't noticed much change in my skin now that I've used it a little while. Perhaps it needs more time. I have noticed a bit more break outs like others have said, but it's supposed to be drawing stuff out of your skin, so again maybe it just needs more time. I just dab tea tree oil on the break outs and they dry right back up. The customer service has been good so far. It is encouraging to buy from companies that pay attention to their customers. Will keep using the soap. I guess with time we'll see if it becomes something I can't live without.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Town

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help my acne, but otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I think it may not be good to do 2x a day if you have acne prone skin, it certainly didn’t help with mine anyway, but if you don’t have acne, you’ll LOVE it. I use it for my body now. I seriously may not have smelled any product better than this one! It’s addicting. Leaves a good clean feeling too without stripping. And I love that it’s safe.
customer_reviews.author: P. S. Wooster

customer_reviews.title: A good soap
customer_reviews.text: My impression is this is a worthwhile product. However, I did not like the fragrance. I believe it is one I could get used to however, and I will keep it for perhaps a later day use or for other's use. So, because the product presents well---attractive packaging, sense of a well formulated product-- I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: kcdal

product_meta.title: Dead Sea Mud Soap Bar Natural & Organic Ingredients. With Activated Charcoal & Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils. Face Soap or Body Soap. For Men, Women & Teens. Chemical Free. 4.5 oz Bar
feature_bullets: MADE WITH ORGANIC SKIN LOVING OILS: Organic Unrefined Shea Butter, Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Organic Sunflower Oil, Organic Sustainable Palm Oil and Organic Castor Oil.
FOR ALL SKIN TYPES. Use as a face soap, body soap or shaving soap. For men, women and teens. Can be used to help with Acne, Eczema and Psoriasis
NATURALLY SCENTED With Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils Of Lemongrass, Peppermint and Eucalyptus
CRUELTY FREE & VEGAN. Our soaps are never tested on animals and no animal products are used to make this soap

SATISFACTION GUARATEED. We are confident you will love our soap. If you are not satisfied for any reason, it's ok! Just send the package our way and you will receive a full refund of your purchase price.
